name: esformatter-jsx
description: esformatter plugin: format javascript files that contain React JSX blocks

1.0.0.name: esformatter-jsx
1.0.0.description: esformatter plugin: format javascript files that contain React JSX blocks

scripts.watch: mocha -R spec --watch test

1.1.0.name: esformatter-jsx
1.1.0.description: esformatter plugin: format javascript files that contain React JSX blocks

scripts.watch: npm run cover && watch-spawn -p 'specs/**/*.spec.js' -p 'index.js' -p  npm run cover
scripts.lint: npm run beautify && npm run eslint && npm test
scripts.check: npm run beautify-check && npm run eslint && npm test
scripts.install-hooks: prepush install && changelogx install-hook
scripts.bump: bumpery --versionType=patch && npm run changelog && git add changelog.md && git commit -m 'DOC: Generate changelog'

1.2.0.name: esformatter-jsx
1.2.0.description: esformatter plugin: format javascript files that contain React JSX blocks

scripts.watch: npm run cover && watch-spawn -p 'specs/**/*.spec.js' -p 'index.js' -p  npm run cover
scripts.lint: npm run beautify && npm run eslint && npm test
scripts.check: npm run beautify-check && npm run eslint && npm test
scripts.do-changelog: npm run changelog && git add ./changelog.md && git commit -m 'DOC: Generate changelog'
scripts.install-hooks: prepush install && changelogx install-hook

1.3.0.name: esformatter-jsx
1.3.0.description: esformatter plugin: format javascript files that contain React JSX blocks

scripts.watch: npm run cover && watch-spawn -p 'specs/**/*.spec.js' -p 'index.js' -p  npm run cover

scripts.check: npm run beautify-check && npm run eslint && npm test

scripts.install-hooks: prepush install && changelogx install-hook

2.0.0.name: esformatter-jsx
2.0.0.description: esformatter plugin: format javascript files that contain React JSX blocks

scripts.watch: npm run cover && watch-spawn -p 'specs/**/*.spec.js' -p 'index.js' -p  npm run cover
scripts.lint: npm run beautify && npm run eslint && npm test
scripts.check: npm run beautify-check && npm run eslint && npm test
scripts.do-changelog: npm run changelog && git add ./changelog.md && git commit -m 'DOC: Generate changelog'
scripts.install-hooks: prepush install && changelogx install-hook
scripts.post-v: npm run do-changelog && git push --no-verify && git push --tags --no-verify
scripts.bump-major: npm run pre-v && npm version major -m 'BLD: Release v%s' && npm run post-v
scripts.bump-minor: npm run pre-v && npm version minor -m 'BLD: Release v%s' && npm run post-v
scripts.bump-patch: npm run pre-v && npm version patch -m 'BLD: Release v%s' && npm run post-v

scripts.bump-minor: npm run pre-v && npm version minor -m 'BLD: Release v%s' && npm run post-v
scripts.bump-patch: npm run pre-v && npm version patch -m 'BLD: Release v%s' && npm run post-v

2.3.6.name: esformatter-jsx
2.3.6.description: esformatter plugin: format javascript files that contain React JSX blocks

scripts.watch: npm run cover && watch-spawn -p 'specs/**/*.spec.js' -p 'index.js' -p  npm run cover
scripts.lint: npm run beautify && npm run eslint && npm test
scripts.check: npm run beautify-check && npm run eslint && npm test
scripts.do-changelog: npm run changelog && git add ./changelog.md && git commit -m 'DOC: Generate changelog' --no-verify
scripts.install-hooks: prepush install && changelogx install-hook && precommit install
scripts.post-v: npm run do-changelog && git push --no-verify && git push --tags --no-verify
scripts.bump-major: npm run pre-v && npm version major -m 'BLD: Release v%s' && npm run post-v
scripts.bump-minor: npm run pre-v && npm version minor -m 'BLD: Release v%s' && npm run post-v
scripts.bump-patch: npm run pre-v && npm version patch -m 'BLD: Release v%s' && npm run post-v
